mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id userId, u.username, u.email, u.mobile, u.password, u.status, u.create_time createTime, u.integral, u.last_login_time lastLoginTime, u.modify_time modifyTime, u.avatar, u.plain FROM t_user u WHERE u.username = #{username} GROUP BY u.username, u.user_id, u.email, u.mobile, u.password, u.status, u.create_time, u.integral, u.last_login_time, u.modify_time, u.avatar
select user_id userId from t_user_data_permission where user_id = #{userId}
